title: All upscaling threads use the last thread's subdirectory
body:
`python video2x.py -i %~nx1 -o new.mp4 --method=cudnn --threads=3 --width=1920 --height=1080`

```
[+] INFO: Starting to upscale extracted images
2019-06-13 15:28:25.066069 [+] INFO: Starting upscaled image cleaner

2019-06-13 15:28:25.067069 [+] INFO: [upscaler] Thread 0 started
2019-06-13 15:28:25.068068 [+] INFO: Executing: ['D:\\waifu2x-caffe\\waifu2x-caffe-cui.exe', '--output_extention', 'png', '--mode', 'noise_scale', '--scale_width', '1920', '--scale_height', '1080', '--noise_level', '0', '--process', 'cudnn', '--crop_size', '128', '--output_quality', '-1', '--output_depth', '8', '--batch_size', '1', '--gpu', '0', '--tta', '0', '--input_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmprizrmkm7\\2', '--output_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpyql5scle']

2019-06-13 15:28:25.068068 [+] INFO: [upscaler] Thread 1 started
2019-06-13 15:28:25.070092 [+] INFO: Executing: ['D:\\waifu2x-caffe\\waifu2x-caffe-cui.exe', '--output_extention', 'png', '--mode', 'noise_scale', '--scale_width', '1920', '--scale_height', '1080', '--noise_level', '0', '--process', 'cudnn', '--crop_size', '128', '--output_quality', '-1', '--output_depth', '8', '--batch_size', '1', '--gpu', '0', '--tta', '0', '--input_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmprizrmkm7\\2', '--output_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpyql5scle']

2019-06-13 15:28:25.071070 [+] INFO: [upscaler] Thread 2 started
2019-06-13 15:28:25.073069 [+] INFO: Executing: ['D:\\waifu2x-caffe\\waifu2x-caffe-cui.exe', '--output_extention', 'png', '--mode', 'noise_scale', '--scale_width', '1920', '--scale_height', '1080', '--noise_level', '0', '--process', 'cudnn', '--crop_size', '128', '--output_quality', '-1', '--output_depth', '8', '--batch_size', '1', '--gpu', '0', '--tta', '0', '--input_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmprizrmkm7\\2', '--output_path', 'C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpyql5scle']

```

Note that all of the threads are working with `C:\\Users\\Jane\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmprizrmkm7\\2`, instead of working with 0, 1, and 2 respectively.

This has had the effect on the final video you would expect.
